# requestSupplementaryLexicon(completion:)

**Instance Method**

Obtains a supplementary lexicon of term pairs in a custom keyboard.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func requestSupplementaryLexicon(completion completionHandler: @escaping (UILexicon) -> Void)
```

```swift
@MainActor func requestSupplementaryLexicon() async -> UILexicon
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: Code that you write to make use of the returned `UILexicon` object.

## Discussion

Call this method to obtain a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILexicon] object containing a basic set of term pairs for use in autocorrection or textual suggestions based on user input. The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILexicon] object contains words from various sources, including:

- Unpaired first names and last names from the userâ€™s Address Book database
- Text shortcuts defined in the Settings > General > Keyboard > Shortcuts list
- A common words dictionary

Consider this lexicon as a supplement to a more complete lexicon of your own design.
title: requestSupplementaryLexicon(completion:)
